form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: REQUEST FOR INFORMATION FROM NATURALIZATION FILE

full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE REQUEST FOR INFORMATION FROM NATURALIZATION FILE (If N-585 is attached, fill in items 2, 3 and 6 only) 1. CERTIFICATE NO. C1 421 936 196 2. REQUESTING OFFICE NEW 3. DATE OF REQUEST 1/25/65 4. FILE NO. A13 833 785 N-600 dwc 5. NAME OF APPLICANT NATHAN PEARL 6. REASON FOR REQUEST THIS IS NOTAITE TO NOT KXK a. Derivative FILE REI f. Application for Certificate, N-580 b. Lost Papers IF CEST 8. Denaturalization proceedings c. Special Certificate h. Birth Date d. New Name Certificate 1. Information from Record furnish copy of Petition Old Certificate submitted e. New Name Certificate WO j. Other (Specify, indicate application Form No. if any) Old Certificate lost or mutilated 7. NAME OF NATURALIZED PERSON IRINS, AT TIME OF NATURALIZATION JACOB PEARL 8. DATE OF BIRTH 9. COURT (TITLE and LOCATION) A 10. DATE OF NATURALIZATION 11. NO EVIDENCE OF LOSS OF CITIZENSHIP 12. COMPLETE FILE FORWARDED 13. PHOTOGRAPH OF CERTIFICATE ATTACHED APPEARS IN FILE C 421934 & NY, 20 spcl I W W. 14. PHOTOGRAPH OF PETITION ATTACHED New Examiner 15. PETITION FILED ON 5-8-19 SHOWS DATE OF BIRTH TO BE 7-15-79 SIGNATURE OF TRANSCRIBER Brown DATE TRANSCRIBED 1-28-65 Form G-347 (Rev. 3-25-64)
